name: Mets
title: CS Mets at DX
notes: **Note**:  Involvement of peripheral and central lymph nodes, distant nodes for ocular adnexal lymphomas, is coded in CS Lymph Nodes and not in CS Mets at DX.
footnotes: - Stage grouping for AJCC 6 staging of ocular adnexal lymphoma for cases collected in CSv2 is derived from a combination of CS Extension, CS Lymph Nodes, and CS Mets at DX codes as shown in the AJCC TNM 6 Stage table .  A or B categories  is appended to Stage I-IV based on coding of CS Site-Specific Factor 2, Systemic Symptoms at Diagnosis.
